item.title: My post
item.description: /project/project1/ https://www.google.com I got my DJI Drone last week! Python list = [0,2,5,7,8,4] count = list[0] for i in list: if(count < i): count = i print("Max number is", count) ## Max number is 8 R code library(reticulate) a = c(1,4,5,6,7) py$list ## [1] 0 2 5 7 8 4 py$count ## [1] 8 Python r.a ## [1.0, 4.0, 5.0, 6.0, 7.0]
